attributes.action: During Covid 19 crisis make parking for all staff FREE AND ON SITE PLEASE.
attributes.additional_details: This will reduce pressure on staff to use public transport and reduce possible exposure. In many cases it cut travelling time significantly and help tired people to know they don't have to struggle with parking.
attributes.background: At present most NHS staff members have to park distances away from Hospitals/places of work. And pay for that.  During the COVID 19 crisis visitors are staying away and parking is plentiful. Of course this will mean a loss of income to Trusts. But it shows appreciation and care.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
